description:
The story of Shinemon that spans two generations...... is supposed to have ended, but both Shinemon and Shin appears!? Shinemon and Shin reminisce about their individual pasts.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: 3人のアイドル? / 新田シン
Vanguard Abnormality: Shinemon Encyclopedia - Three Idols? / Shin Nitta
